texts.es: Don Miguel de 67 años de edad viven casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su pick up desde hace 8 años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposa.
texts.en:
Miguel, 67, owns the home where he lives with his wife. He has been driving a pick up truck for transportation for 8 years. He has a lot of customers who prefer him because he is a responsible driver. He earns enough from his work to cover the household expenses.

He is asking for a loan to buy tires and perform maintenance on his vehicle, which is his only source of income. He wants to be able to have a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy tires and do maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph has a motorcycle transport business in Eldoret town and has been in the business for 6 years now. He is 36 years old, married, and together with his spouse they have been blessed with 4 children.

He will use this loan to buy spare parts and service his motorcycle so it can be in good condition. This will enable him to serve more customers and get more income. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business by buying another motorcycle.

This is his first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and in future he hopes to have a prosperous and successful business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to service his motorcycle.

loans.name: Vilma  Maribel

texts.es: Vilma de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de la carretera y posee muchos clientes especialmente las personas que viajan en sus vehículos, Vilma está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas frutas por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas ya que le dejan buenas ganancias y asi poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Vilma is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her ​​life partner and her daughter.  She sells fruit.  Her business is located on the roadside and she has many customers especially those traveling in their vehicles.

Vilma he is requesting a loan to buy more fruits wholesale.  In this way, she can continue as her sales and thus give her a good profit and have a better economic stability ..

loans.use: to buy fruit wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee desde hace 3 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la variedad de productos, la joven vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, azúcar, detergentes, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The young person is 24 years old and lives in high-risk area.  For three years, she has had a small store located in her residence.

She has many customers for good prices and variety of products.  She lives in her own house with her ​​life partner and their two daughters.  She is requesting a loan to buy more soups, eggs, grains, soft drinks, candy, pastries, sugar, detergents, etc. so she can have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, grains, soft drinks, candy, pastries, sugar, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new DJ equipment for work.

loans.name: Hillary

texts.en:
Hillary is a smallholder farmer based in Kapsowar in the North Rift area of Kenya. He makes a living growing crops and raising dairy animals for commercial end. He carries out these activities on a small farm that he has been running for over 6 years. He has only one child with his lovely wife Lilian. 
The village Hillary hails from is situated in an extremely remote location called Moiben. Here, animal-powered transportation is very common. Although this may seem primitive in comparison to modern transportation, animals in the area allow great advancements through facilitation of trade. 
Hillary is seeking a loan to purchase a motorcycle. He already owns one but he is planning to buy more to fulfill the demand for a modern form of transportation. Frequently, trips between 0 and 5 kilometers in rural communities are undertaken for farming purposes and domestic needs. The animal-drawn transport equipment available are limited and have design deficiencies which limit efficient usage.
With your loan, Hillary will purchase an Indian motorcycle that will be used to ferry passengers and goods within and beyond the village. They are faster, cheaper, easier to maintain and more economic on fuel. Besides, ownership of animals with their transport devices are only attractive when animals are also engaged in other activities.
This loan will benefit Hillary's family by reducing the high costs they spend on transportation every month. Returns from the investment will go to his child's education and family welfare.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for farm transportation.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina works hard to support her family. Josefina is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Josefina has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Josefina has been in this business for 25 years now. In the future, Josefina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: January

texts.en:
January is a 32-year-old married man with five children. He lives in Kasese, Uganda.

January used his previous loan to buy clothes to sell and was able to get profits.

Floods impacted his farming project where he had expected income to help him add stock to his clothing shop and introduce new designs that needed a lot of money. Despite the shortcomings, he is determined to take his business to greater heights and have a classic boutique in his area. January needs this loan to buy clothes to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.name: Sultan

texts.en:
Sultan is 54 years old married woman and the mother of five children. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his own rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses. Now his rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine.

For this reason, Sultan has applied for a loan of Rs 35,000 to buy tires and spare parts for the vehicle. This will help her husband drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Sultan is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts for her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy paint, varnish, oils and other tools.

loans.name: Orlando Jesús

texts.es:
Don Orlando tiene 41 años de edad, casado padre de dos hijos, el se dedica tiempo completo a la Agricultura, actualmente tiene cosechado una manzana de Piña los cuales tiene 1.500 plantas de piña.
solicita este crédito para la compra de fertilizantes para darle un optimo y mejorado mantenimiento a su cultivo de piña, gracias a este financiamiento que se le esta otorgando sus cultivo serán de mayor calidad ya que con los insumos que compre evitara la maleza y plagas que en ocasiones atacan a la Piña, muy agradecido don Orlando con Kiva y Afodenic por brindarle nuevamente la oportunidad y confianza con este crédito ya que con las ganancias obtenidas a sacado adelante a su familia
texts.en:
Orlando is 41 years old, married, and a father of two. He works full time in agriculture. He has already harvested one section of his pineapple crops with 1,500 pineapple plants.

He has applied for this loan to buy fertilizers for improved, optimal pineapple crop maintenance. Thanks to this funding, his crops will be of a higher quality as, with the supplies that he is able to buy, he will be able to prevent the growth of weeds and repel pests that occasionally affect the pineapples. 

Orlando is grateful to Kiva and AFODENIC for having given him an opportunity once again and for having trusted him with this loan. The profits that he has earned have helped his family to get ahead.

loans.use: to manage his pineapple crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron sheets, nails, wall paint, timber and cement to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.en:
Abraham is thankful that he was granted a 22,000 PHP loan which he used to buy additional supplies and merchandise products such as clothing, footwear, and cosmetics needed in his business. His earnings help meet his family's daily needs.

He is such a hardworking entrepreneur, lately he went into rag making business (where he is shown in his photo) which is making good profit. He is now applying for a PHP 25,000 loan to buy more fabric, thread and also more merchandise items and products for his direct sales business. He is positive that he will yield a good return on his investments. He is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given him.

Abraham dreams of having more business so he could provide jobs for those jobless in their area. He prays that he and his wife will stay strong and healthy and see children finish their studies. Every week, he meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which he studies .

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: to purchase additional fabrics, thread, and supplies for his new rag making business and also more merchandise items and products for his direct sales business.

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
Melinda is 43 years old and married with two children, one of which is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Melinda has a general store business in the Philippines. Melinda requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries like canned goods, laundry soap, rice and other groceries.

Melinda has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Melinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like canned goods, laundry soap, rice and other groceries.

loans.name: Daniel Israel

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del Amor, un Cantón de clima cálido húmedo, rodeado de gente trabajadora, el mismo cuenta varios sitios de descanso que son muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, como tradición tienen las fiestas del Cantón en las cuales se realizan bailes populares y la famosa quema del castillo la gente en este Cantón es muy amable y tranquila con todos sus visitan.
En este Cantón vive y trabaja el señor Daniel un joven luchador de 25 años mantiene una sólida relación en unión libre tienen 2 hijos pero en relaciones anteriores, trabaja como chofer en la Parroquia de Mindo, viene de una familia de bajos recursos económicos y tuvo que trabajar desde muy joven, trabajaba de lunes a viernes y estudiaba los fines de semana, solicita este crédito para emprender en un salón de belleza, la esposa no trabaja se encargará del negocio, tomo cursos y tiene experiencia en belleza y peluquería, a esta actividad le dedicara un promedio de 12 horas diarias, con esta inversión mejorarán sus ingresos económicos, para continuar ayudando a sus hijos. El señor Daniel agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos has a warm and humid climate and is surrounded by hard-working people. It has several relaxation areas that are visited a lot by tourists from both Ecuador and overseas. As a tradition, they have fiestas where they have popular dances and the famous “quema del castillo” (fireworks display). The people in this canton are very kind and calm towards all those who visit.

Daniel lives and works in this canton. He is a determined young man who is 25 years of age. He is in a solid relationship in a common-law marriage. He and his partner have two children from previous relationships. He works as a driver in the parish of Mindo. He comes from a family with few economic resources and he had to work from a young age. He worked from Monday to Friday and studied during the weekends. He is requesting this loan to start a beauty salon. His wife doesn’t work and will be in charge of the business. She took courses and has experience in beauty and hairdressing. She will spend an average of 12 hours a day working in the beauty salon. They will improve their income with this investment, meaning they can continue helping their children. 

Daniel is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and the opportunities they offer.

loans.use: to start his own business, which will be a beauty salon that his wife will be in charge of. With this income, they will be able to continue supporting their children in their studies.

loans.name: Grupo Los Comerciantes Del Caserio Los Morales Group

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 42 años de edad, el es una hombre emprendedor y decidido para poder superar en la vida, el no se deja vencer por los obstáculos que la vida le pone sino el alcanza todo sus mentas y sueños, el tiene tres hijos que mantener el primero ya trabaja para ayudar en los recursos económicos de su familia y los dos últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad. (Antonio es la que se  encuentra de 1ra de derecha a la izquierda en la fotografía).
	
El obtiene sus ingresos económicos por medio de la producción de verduras en la comunidad donde el vive, sus padres le enseñaron dicha actividad desde hace 15 años, el realiza la venta de su producto en el mercado y en los alrededores de su comunidad y así tener un ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que le dará al crédito es para la compra de verduras, ya que para el es de mucha importancia que sus plantas de verduras produzcan frutos de primera calidad y así no perder a los clientes con que el cuenta.

El es un buen ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de hombres se ha decidido a emprender el negocio junto a el y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias, una de las grandes aspiraciones de el es la siembra de más plantas de verduras y ver crecer a sus hijos en el campo de la educación y convertirse en profesionales en la vida.
texts.en:
Antonio, 42, is an enterprising and purposeful man who wants to better his life. He doesn't give up when faced with life's obstacles, but reaches all his goals and dreams. He has three children to take care of, the oldest of whom now works to help with the family's finances. The younger two are excellent students in the local school.

Antonio earns money growing vegetables in the community where he lives. His parents taught him this work 15 years ago. He sells his products in the market and the areas surrounding his town, and it gives him money to improve his family's living conditions.

The loan will be used to buy vegetables since it's important that his plants produce fruits of the highest quality so that he doesn't lose his customers. He is a good example in his community and for that reason a group of men has decided to go into business together with him and improve life for all of their families. One of his greatest dreams is to plant more vegetables, and to see his children grow in their education and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Expedito está en su ciclo número 2 del comité de mujeres, es un grupo bastante numeroso, donde son 25 integrantes, cada una de ella esta haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Daniela , quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de frutas y verduras se gana la vida de una manera honesta y por sobre todo digna. Es una mujer muy sacrificada, que se esta esforzando por su familia.
La Sra. Daniela pide este préstamo para la compra de verduras, Frutas frescas, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y mas venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The San Expedito group is in its second cycle of the women's committee. It is a very large group with 25 members. Each of them has undertaken the poverty elimination survey to be able to get to know each one's life situation. 

One of the members is Daniela who, in her last survey, registered a stage of poverty at level 1. This means that through her continued effort and work, and through fruit and vegetable sales, she is making an honest living that is above all dignified. She is a woman who makes sacrifices and is making a great effort for her family.

Daniela is asking for this loan to buy fresh fruits and vegetables. This will help her to obtain more produce and make more sales, which will help her to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Ana Marlene

texts.es: Ana de 32 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora que todos los días se levanta desde muy temprano para atender su negocio de crianza y venta de pollos, la cual realiza desde hace 10 años en su vivienda, por lo que cuenta con una gran demanda de sus productos y sus clientes cada día solicitan más sus productos. Ella vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus 4 hijos de 17, 14, 12 y 1 años de edad en vivienda propia desde hace 5 años. Ana sabe que la época alta para la venta de pollos y gallinas esta cerca, por lo que esta emprendedora mujer desea invertir en su negocio para comprar una mayor cantidad de pollos y gallinas, y así tener lo suficiente para cubrir la demanda de pollos y gallinas en la época alta de ventas, pero Ana no cuenta con la liquidez económica necesaria por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: gallinas indias y pollos de engorde.
texts.en: 32-year-old Ana is a hard-working woman who gets up very early every morning to tend to her business of raising and selling chickens. She has been doing this for ten years from her home, which is why there is great demand for her products and her clients order more of her products every day. She has lived with her partner and their four children, aged 17, 14, 12, and 1, for five years. Ana knows that the peak season for selling chickens and hens is near, which is why this enterprising woman wishes to invest in her business in order to buy a greater quantity of chickens and hens. In this way she will have enough to meet the demand for chickens and hens in the peak sales period, but Ana does not have the necessary funds, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying hens and broiler chickens.

loans.use: to invest in hens and broiler chickens

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un cibercafé (servicio de computadoras) ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada y por esa razón posee muchos clientes, la joven vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de papelería , tinta para impresoras y darle mantenimiento a las computadoras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi podrá tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young woman, whose face has been pixelated as she is 28 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, owns an Internet café (computer services). It is located near her house in an area with high foot traffic; for this reason, she has many clients. The young woman lives in her own house with her husband and daughter. She is requesting a loan in order to buy stationery and printer inks and do maintenance on her computers since this is her only source of work. In this way, she will be able to have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy stationery and printer ink, and to do maintenance on her computers

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: María de 48 años de edad es una mujer que siempre se esfuerza por salir adelante al lado de su familia, apoyada en su negocio, ella vive junto a su esposo, sus 2 hijos de 21 y 25 años de edad y un nieto de 6 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que siempre está buscando la manera de sacar adelante a su familia y es por ello que desde hace 15 años se gana la vida elaborando pan dulce en su vivienda. María desea invertir en su venta de pan, para elaborar y vender pan dulce y pan francés, con el crédito que solicita a FUSAI María invertirá en: harina, azúcar, leche, huevos, manteca, etc. para elaborar una mayor cantidad de pan y obtener mejores ingresos al invertir por mayor.
texts.en: María, 48 years old, is a woman who is always working to get ahead alongside her family, supported by her business. She lives with her husband, their two sons who are 21 and 25 years old, and a grandson who is 6. She is a woman who is always looking for ways for her family to succeed and it is because of this that for 15 years she has earned a living making pastry bread and French bread. With the loan she asked of FUSAI María will invest in flour, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, etc. to make a larger amount of bread and earn a greater income to buy wholesale.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, etc.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen de 44 años de edad es madre soltera vive con su hija en casa propia, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz, maicillo y pipián, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 44-year-old single mother who lives in her own home along with her daughter. She has been farming for several years, growing corn, sorghum, and pumpkins. Her products are sold at different markets near her house.

Carmen is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizers, composts, pest controls, and other supplies so that she can improve the land that is shown in the photograph. As a result, she can continue her work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, composts, pest controls, and other supplies.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith is a 50-year-old woman married to Solomon, who adds additional income to support their family.  They are blessed with five children. Edith has been selling charcoal for a period of ten years earning herself an income of 8,000 KES at the end of every month.

Edith was introduced to VisionFund Kenya by a Credit Officer and is now servicing her first loan of 10,000 KES and intends to use this amount to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers on a daily basis.

Edith plans to use the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children and hopes to become a successful business woman with a bright future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 36 años de vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 4 años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes que la prefieren por los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, chicharrón, frijoles, harina de arroz, quesillo, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dora, 36 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and her two children.  She has worked for 4 years in the making and selling pupusas (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans.)  Her business is located in her house, and she has many customers that prefer her for the good prices.  

She is requesting a loan to buy corn, pork, beans, rice flour, cheese, etc. to be able to continue her work; and thus, to be able to have better income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn, pork, beans, rice flour, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy nets and drag nets and to do maintenance on his boat motor.

loans.name: Anacleta Consuelo

texts.es: Anacleta de 62 años de edad se dedica a la venta de zapatos desde hace 30 años, su negocio está ubicado en el mercado municipal en una zona muy transitada, por eso posee muchos clientes, Anacleta vive en casa propia con su esposo, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de zapatos por mayor para poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Anacleta is 62, she sells shoes, has done so for 30 years.  Her business is located in the municipal market in a very busy zone.  She has many customers, Anacleta lives in a house she owns with her husband, with the sales she makes she is able to cover expenses that come up.  She is requesting a loan to buy shoes at wholesale prices to be able to have better income.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional containers of coconut wine to sell for her business. Milagros has been in this business for 22 years. Milagros earns more income from coconut husk making.

Milagros has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 37 years old and has a live-in partner with two children.

Marilyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Marilyn has borrowed and paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns income from fruit vending.

Marilyn aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Norah

texts.en:
Norah used her previous loan to buy shoes to sell and the business is doing well.

Norah lives in Kasese-Uganda with her 6 children. She is a hardworking and loving parent who would like to see her children acquire university educations despite the challenge of inadequate capital.

Norah intends to use the loan to buy shoes for selling.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Merla

texts.en:
Merla works hard to support her family. Merla is married and has a direct-selling personal product business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of personal products to sell to her customers.

Merla has been in this business for six years now. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of personal products to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Weldon

texts.en: Hello world, meet Weldon, a 40 year-old farmer from Cheborgei location in the South Rift region of Kenya. Weldon has been married for 6 years. Gladys, his hardworking spouse, has given him a boy who is 2 years old and a girl who is 9 months old. To provide for this lovely small family, Weldon practises dairy and poultry farming on a single acre piece of land. He owns 10 birds of poultry and a dairy cow named Birirmet (vernacular meaning 'a brown-headed cow'). Weldon is seeking a loan to construct a cow shed in order to offer protection to his cow and prevent her from experiencing harsh weather conditions. Your loan investment will help Weldon create a conducive environment for his cow to improve milk production. The income he makes from selling milk will increase as a result and his family will be positively impacted through increased income and improved diet.

loans.use: to construct a cow shed

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz tiene 40 años de edad, es casada desde hace 16 años, su esposo también es un micro empresario dedicado a la publicidad gráfica, tienen dos hijos una tiene 15 años y está cursando el noveno nivel en un colegio técnico y el menor que tiene 6 años está en el Kínder. Beatriz anteriormente participaba en un grupo que recibía financiamiento por parte de Fundación Mujer con el cual inicio con un monto de 50 000 colones y llego hasta el tercer nivel en ese tiempo de 200 000 colones, con el cual obtuvo una de las máquinas que actualmente utiliza. El fuerte de doña Beatriz es la confección de edredones, fundas, almohadas, comestiqueras, toalleros, sed para baños, manteles y llaveros; son diseños originales y con acabados muy buenos es por eso que cuenta con una cartera de clientes fijos. Ella inició su actividad desde hace 5 años, pero oficialmente empezó a ofrecer sus productos hace tres años. Le vende a escuelas especialmente en el día del Amor y la Amistad y el día de la Madre. También ofrece por medio de una amiga a las reclusas de la penitenciaria. Necesita este crédito para comprarse una máquina que le permita un acabado más rápido, profesional y compra de materia prima para confeccionar los pedidos de navidad, que se considera como una época alta. Doña Beatriz habita en una zona donde no se existen suficientes fuentes de empleo, por lo que muchas de las mujeres de la zona deciden montar su propia actividad productiva que les permita aportar al hogar o estudios de sus hijos. Su sueño es agrandar su taller, tener más máquinas y dar empleo a mujeres de la zona.
texts.en:
Beatrice is 40 years old and married for 16 years.  Her husband is also an entrepreneur dedicated to graphic advertising.  They have two children, of which one is 15 and is in his ninth level at a technical school and the youngest is 6 years is in kindergarten.

Beatriz previously participated in a group receiving funding from Fundación Mujer with whom she started with an amount of 50,000 colones and moved up to third level at the time of 200,000 colones, with which she obtained one of the machines she currently uses. The strength that Beatriz has is making quilts, pillowcases, pillows, potholders, towel for bathrooms, tablecloths and keychains.

They are original designs and with very good finishes which is why she has a portfolio of repeat customers. She started business five years ago, but officially began offering her products for three years. She sells to schools especially at Valentine's Day and Mother's Day.  She also offers her wares via a friend to the inmates of the prison.

She needs this loan to buy a machine that will allow a faster and more professional finish and purchase of raw material for making Christmas orders, which is considered high season. Beatriz lives in an area where adequate sources of employment do not exist.  Many of the women in the area decided to start their own productive activity that allows them to contribute to the household or your children's education. Her dream is to enlarge her workshop, have more machines and employ women in the area.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and supplies.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 27 years old, married and together with her spouse they have been blessed with 3 children. She has a tailoring business which she has been running for 5 years.

Judith will be using this loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials for sewing. These include textile materials,threads and buttons. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

This is her third loan term with VisionFund Kenya and she paid her previous loans successfully. Her future hopes are to expand her business and improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy textile materials for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase new and stylish women's clothes, accessories, and makeup.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
The person appearing in the photo is Susan, married and blessed with eight children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) in February 2013.

Susan is a maize and beans farmer and also sells honey in the local market. She is grateful to HiH EA for enterprise training. She is borrowing the Kiva loan to add more stock of honey. This will enable her to satisfy the rising demand for the product. She hopes to get more profits and cater to her family's needs such as education and food.

Susan is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for their support. She promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To purchase honey for resale

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
Las 15 integrantes de este comité son mujeres jefas de hogares, que decidieron tomar en sus manos la posta para poder ayudar a sus familias.
La señora Karol es una de las integrantes del  comité  tiene un Kiosco donde vende todo tipo de productos, y por ello es que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela. Su kiosco lo monto con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio, y hoy día le va ya muy bien.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar golosinas, galletitas, bebidas, jugos, yogur y demás, de manera a poder seguir teniendo todo tipo de productos que son muy solicitados por sus clientes.
texts.en:
The 15 members of this group are women who are heads of household that decided to take into their own hands the challenge to help their families.
Karol is one of the committee members, she has a store where she sells all sorts of products and this is why she has a good number of customers.  Her kiosk was started with a lot of effort and sacrifice and today she does well.  She requests a loan to buy candy, cookies, drinks, juices, yogurt and others.  This way she will have all the products that are requested by her customers.

loans.use: to buy candy, cookies, drinks, juices, yogurt and others for sale.

loans.name: Virgen De La Misericordia Group

texts.es:
El grupo Virgen de la Misericordia  se formo en la ciudad de Caaguazú, ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que a través de la encuesta de los 50 indicadores podrán ir mejorando.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Zunilda quien se dedica a la venta de comidas que ella misma hace todos los días desde muy temprano, y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante, ella es muy buena con las comidas que hace, por lo que le va muy bien.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser verduras, carnes, condimentos y demás, de manera a poder seguir luchando por su familia y seres queridos. Cada una de ellas está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
The group “Virgen de La Misericordia” (Our Lady of Mercy) was formed in the city of Caaguazú. These women are extremely hardworking and enterprising. They are participating in the poverty elimination program, which includes a survey of 50 indicators in which they could be improving.

One of the members is Sra. Zunilda, who prepares food that she prepares herself. Every day she begins her work very early and then goes out to sell as a street vendor. Zunilda is very good at preparing food, which is why she is doing well.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies so that she can continue making her dishes. These items include vegetables, meats, condiments, and other products. As a result, Zunilda will be able to keep striving on behalf of her family and loved ones.

Each woman is giving her best effort so that she can continue in her work.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meats, condiments, and other supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Emprendedoras está en su séptimo ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, cada una está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y ser alguien mejor.
La Sra. Maria, una de ellas, es una persona que se está esforzando por sus seres queridos y su familia, se dedica a las ventas varias de todo tipo de productos, sabe que debe esforzarse un poco más para poder salir adelante e ir superándose día a día.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de azúcar, fideos, carne, leche, artículos para mercería, etc., ella al igual que sus demás amigas está muy contenta y quiere seguir capacitándose para poder crecer.
texts.en: The Mujeres Emprendedoras group is in its seventh loan cycle with the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other to get ahead. They are on a quest to eliminate poverty, and each one is making her best effort to grow and be better. Maria, who is one of them, is exerting herself for her loved ones and her family by selling all kinds of products. She knows that she needs to exert herself even more to get ahead and to overcome day by day. She is requesting this loan to buy sugar, beans, meat, milk, sewing articles, etc. Along with her friends she is happy and wants to continue getting training to be able to create.

loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, meat, milk, sewing articles, etc.

loans.name: Kuña Saraki Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre Kuña Saraki son de la ciudad de Itá, ellas son mujeres luchadoras que están poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para ayudar a sus familias, ellas están capacitándose y con ello podrán dar a sus seres queridos una vida digna.
Todas ellas participan activamente, en especial Cinthia, quien se dedica a la venta de helados y de bebidas, comenta que esta temporada es en la que le va mejor, ya que tiene muchas ventas por el calor que hace. Pensando en la gran demanda que tendrá, pide este préstamo para poder comprar bebidas varias, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group is called Kuña Saraki and the members are from the city of Ita.  They are a group of determined women who are doing their best to help their families.  They are qualified and thus can give their loved ones a dignified life.

All of the members are active, especially Cinthia, who sells ice cream and drinks.  She says this season is when she does best, as she has many sales when the temperature is high. Thinking of the high demand, she is requesting this loan to buy several beverages, and thus be able to continue with her sales as before.

loans.use: to buy various beverages for sale.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es una persona muy trabajadora, tiene su negocio que es una despensa y su pequeño tambo.
El a la par que está trabajando también estudia, la carrera que eligió es la de psicología, quiere ser un gran profesional para poder ayudar a las demás personas a través de su carrera.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas,  y de esa forma poder luchar por su meta que es la de ser un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Juan is a hardworking person. He has a business running a grocery store and small milking yard.

At the same time that he works, he is also studying psychology. He wants to be a professional and to be able to help other people through his career. He asks for this loan to pay his university costs so that he can keep fighting to achieve his goal of graduating.

loans.use: to pay university costs.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.es:
Ninfa es estudiante universitaria, cursando el 4to. Año de la Carrera de Administración de Empresas, es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora.
Ella estudia y trabaja para ayudarle a su familia.  Su sueño es de poder culminar sus estudios, tener un título universitario para poder trabajar y enseñar en las Universidades. 
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el gasto  de su titulación, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con su meta y cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
Ninfa is a college student, in her 4th year pursuing a career in Business Administration. She is a very responsible, honest and hardworking person.

She studies and works to help her family. Her dream is to be able to complete her studies, have a college degree, and  to work and teach in universities.

She is requesting this loan to invest in the cost of her degree, so that she can continue with her goals and fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to pay for costs of education.

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick, 27, is a smallholder farmer residing in Litein, an agricultural town in the South Rift region of Kenya. He is arguably among the most successful client of Juhudi Kilimo, a microfinance institution that deals only with smallholder farmers in rural parts of Kenya.

Back in 2009, Erick practiced traditional farming with little knowledge and no financing at all. He was doing only half an acre of maize crop per season. The returns were so meager that he could barely fend for survival. He kept doing maize farming for years without turning a profit until 2012, when he switched to tomato farming and there was light at the end of the tunnel for Erick.

Today, David is a fully-fledged entrepreneur. He has been provided with technical guidance, training programs and exposure visits by Juhudi Kilimo.

To capitalize more on returns from the booming tomato farming, Erick is seeking a loan of KES 70,000 to build a quality greenhouse. Unlike his competition, Erick conducts proper soil preparation and uses modern farming techniques to ensure high quality produce. By doing this, he has created a name for himself and a demand for his produce.

Your lending will contribute greatly to the actualization of Erick’s goal, which is to expand the greenhouse. In the future, he is also planning to introduce zero grazing method, intensify his dairy farming, and start value addition.

loans.use: To build a quality green house

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Hello, lenders. Meet Susan. She is a 40-year-old smallholder farmer based in Eldoret, which is a small rural town in the Rift Valley region of Kenya.

Susan and her husband have been blessed with 7 angel-looking children. For four years, Susan has been a mixed farmer. She keeps dairy cattle and poultry on her farm. She also grows vegetables, among other crops. Despite prevailing animal diseases, she finds dairy farming to be the most enjoyable commercial farming activity.

Besides dairy farming, she has a deep connection with gardening. In African communities, gardening is the most popular, yet the least exclusive hobby for women. You really don't have to be born with a green thumb to give life to a glorious garden; any woman with a homestead and a few square feet of earth is doing her best to make her little corner of the world more gracious and beautiful.

Susan is taking this a little step further. She is seeking a loan to start horticultural farming. This is a big deal for her. She is very excited to start growing different varieties of crops for commercial purposes. The demand for vegetables and other greens is always high.

Income from this venture will cover the high farming expenses she has to deal with currently. In the long run, with increased income, she will finally be able to satisfy her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: To start horticulture farming

loans.name: Yessica Lisseth

texts.es: Yessica de 25 años de edad es una joven luchadora que se gana la vida con su negocio de venta de frutas y verduras en un lugar de mucha afluencia de personas, por lo que sus ventas son bastante buenas. Ella vive junto a sus 2 hijos de 7 y 5 años de edad, como madre soltera sabe que tiene que dar todo lo mejor de ella para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Yessica tiene el deseo de mejorar su negocio ya que ha observado que cada día son más los clientes que solicitan sus productos, y es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: tomates, cebollas, papas, güisquiles, plátanos, aguacates, etc.
texts.en: Yessica, 25 years old, is a young fighter that earns a living through her business, selling fruits and vegetables in a high foot-traffic area, because of this her sales are pretty good. She lives with her two sons, 7 and 5 years old, and as a single mother she knows she must give all of herself to raise her sons well. Yessica wants to improve her business as she has observed that every day there are more customers that want her products, and because of this she asks a loan from FUSAI to invest in tomatoes, onions, potatoes, chayotes, plantains, avocados, and other items.

loans.use: to invest in tomatoes, onions, potatoes, chayotes, plantains, avocados, etc.

loans.name: Marilú Elizabeth

texts.es: Marilú de 37 años de edad, esta soliictando un nuevo crédito para surtir más su negocio de venta de ropa ambulante, ella comprara faldas, vestidos, lycras, short, pantalones, calcetines, boxer. ropa interior femenina, etc. con el crédito anterior abastecio de mercaderia y le fue muy bien.
texts.en:
Marilú is 37 years old. She is requesting a new loan in order to restock her business of selling clothes as a street vendor.

Marilú will buy skirts, dresses, lycra garments, shorts, trousers, socks, boxers, women’s undergarments, and other items. Her previous loan was used to acquire merchandise and she did very well.

loans.use: to buy skirts, dresses, lycra garments, shorts, trousers, socks, boxers, women’s undergarments, and other items.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 29-year-old married man with three children living with his family in his own house in Haja city, Yemen. He is the sole breadwinner of the family. His income is very a small and isn't enough to cover the needs of the family.

Khaled works hard to improve his income. He has decided to purchase a motorcycle to work as a driver to transport people from one area to another to earn money that will help him in provide his family with a better future. Khaled thinks this business will be profitable for him, but he doesn't have enough money to do that. Therefore, he applied for a Youth loan of 184,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a motorcycle to use it as a transportation for himself and to transport people to earn money as a source income for his children.

Khaled hopes to make a better future for his children.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to use as transportation for himself and to transport people to earn money

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goats to raise and sell in animals markets.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
The lady appearing in this photo is Eunice.  She is married and blessed with one child. 

She joined Hand in Hand eastern Africa in February 2013.  Eunice is a maize and beans farmer and also runs a hair salon in the local shopping center. She is grateful to HIH EA for developing an entrepreneurial spirit in her through training and mentor-ship. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to acquire more beauty salon products such as hair gel and shampoo to better serve her customers. 

She hopes to increase profits and support her young family's needs such as education and food.  Eunice is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the support. She promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to purchase beauty salon products like hair gel and shampoo.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es de la ciudad de Lambaré, ella esta estudiando y trabajando al mismo tiempo, ya que sabe que es la única forma en la que se puede salir adelante.
Está estudiando la carrera de psicología, y por medio de ello quiere cumplir su meta de ser un profesional digno y muy competente.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios, luchando por cumplir su sueño y meta.
texts.en: Carmen comes from the city of Lambare. She is studying and working at the same time, because she knows that this is the only way for her to get ahead. She is studying psychology, and she hopes to become a worthy and very competent professional. She is requesting this loan to pay her tuition  so that she can continue studying, and fight to accomplish her dream and her goal.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona es de la ciudad de Pilar, ella es docente, pero a la vez también está haciendo una maestría en administración, ella es una persona que se está esforzando por ser una buena profesional, es por ello que sigue estudiando.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus gastos de transporte, de manera a que con ello podrá cubrir ese gasto que le genera el tener que viajar todos los días para estudiar.
texts.en:
Petrona is from the city of Pilar. She is a teacher but she is also working on her Masters in Administration. She is working hard to be a good professional, which is why she is continuing her studies.

She asks for a loan to pay transportation costs, so that she can cover the expenses of traveling every day to go to school.

loans.use: pay transportation costs to school.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Concepción, comenta que una vez culminada su carrera de administración empresarial, sus aspiraciones son la de llegar a ejercer su profesión y así también la de llevar a la practica en su vida cotidiana, lo aprendido.
Se ve como una persona útil a la sociedad ofreciendo sus conocimientos.
Pide este préstamo apara poder pagar los gastos de su universidad, y así seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Maria lives in the city of Concepción.  She says that after completion of business management degree, her aspirations are to practice her profession and thus also to put into practice in her daily life the skills that she has learned.

She is a useful person to society by offering her knowledge.  She is requesting this loan to pay her college expenses.  Thus she will continue her studies as she has done before.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Jhony

texts.es:
Jhony es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, vive con su madre y a su vez trabaja en una empresa familiar, es una persona que se está esforzando para poder salir adelante y ser un profesional útil a las demás personas y a la sociedad.
Está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial,  y comenta que a través de su carrera podrá abrirse camino y cumplir su meta de ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus estudios y podrá cumplir con su meta y estar más cerca de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Jhony is from the city of San Lorenzo, he lives with his mother and also works in the family business.  He is a person making an effort to get ahead and be a useful professional to others and society.
He is studying to become a Commercial Engineer, and indicates that he through his degree he will be able to make a way and achieve his goal to be someone in life.
He requests a loan to be able to pay for university tuition to continue studying and achieve his goals and be closer to his dreams.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es: Rosa de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 22 años, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal y posee muchos clientes, por la variedad de frutas y verduras que vende y por los buenos precios, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más frutas y verduras por mayor para obtener mejores ingresos y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is 52 years old and lives in her own home with her family.  She has been selling fruit and vegetables for 22 years.  Her business is located in the municipal market and she has many customers due to the the variety of fruits and vegetables she sells and at good prices.

Rosa is requesting a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables in bulk to get better income and so have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Jared

texts.en:
Jared has a motorcycle transport business and has been in the business for 3 years now. He also sells maize and does poultry farming. He is 23 years old, married and, together with his spouse, they have been blessed with 1 child. 

He will use this loan to buy more maize for resale. He will use the anticipated profits to improve his businesses. 

This is Jared's first loan term from VisionFund Kenya. In the future he hopes to be prosperous and successful.

loans.use: To buy maize for resale.

loans.name: Cristina Elizabeth

texts.es: Cristina tiene 35 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee desde hace 10 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Cristina is 35 years old and lives in her own house with her family. She has had a small store located in her household for 10 years. She has many customers due to her good prices and the kindness she has at the time of sale. She is asking a loan to buy more soup, eggs, basic grains, drinks, candies, pastries, etc., and as such to be able to gain higher income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soup, eggs, basic grains, drinks, candies, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Cicilia

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Cicilia, fifty-seven years old and blessed with three children. She lives with her family. She is a dairy farmer; some of the milk is for their domestic consumption and the rest is put into commercial use.

She is borrowing a loan to buy a water tank so that she can harvest water for both domestic and farming use. This will enable her to maintain a consistent supply of milk and hence, improve her income. Cicilia is very happy for Kiva as this will enable her to expand her farming business.

loans.use: To buy a water tank.
